name: Create with Code 2: Unnamed Card Game
name_original: Create with Code 2: Unnamed Card Game
description:
Note: Game works(should not crash) but it's unfinished! I had spent too much time in the jam working on the playing cards code.
The idea was to follow the theme of one rule: play a card to advance

The player will play both sides, but the aim is for the player to advance only the blue team, by playing cards. Some ideas include playing cards that introduce negative cards into the enemy deck(not implemented)

Character sprites are from https://www.kenney.nl/assets/roguelike-characters (CC0 1.0 Universal)
Card art is by me.

Developers involved: mamarladebacon (Matthew Ko)
